Blackboard API

Packages
org.dlw.ai.blackboard Package containing objects that orchestrate this application problem set.
org.dlw.ai.blackboard.dao Package containing data access objects (DAO) specific to this application
org.dlw.ai.blackboard.dao.hibernate Package containing data access objects (DAO) implemented using Hibernate specific to this application
org.dlw.ai.blackboard.domain Package containing domain objects specific to this application
org.dlw.ai.blackboard.exception Package containing exception objects specific to this application
org.dlw.ai.blackboard.knowledge Package containing all things related to knowledge sources.
org.dlw.ai.blackboard.knowledge.primitive Package containing implemented KnowledgeSource(s).
org.dlw.ai.blackboard.rule Package containing classes related to rules and their production.
org.dlw.ai.blackboard.util Package containing class utilities.
